function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Reliance on multiple sources for policy data in the united states","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited update of confirmed cases by region on the public health website of france until 25 march","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Policies not uniformly applied across administrative units","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fractional application of policies within administrative units","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Assumption of local travel ban accompanying home isolation policies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assumption of accompanying policies for home isolation in different countries","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate or incomplete epidemiological data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex and unobserved process of infection rate generation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in the effect of large-scale policy on behavior and infection rates","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in estimating the value of local derivatives in infection rate equations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exponential growth of infections in the initial phase of an epidemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited proportion of immune individuals in the population","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Time-varying policy affecting growth rate of infections","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unbalanced panels in the data due to different start dates for testing for covid-19 in localities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on the assumption of constant exponential growth in early infection rates","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conditional independence assumption between policy deployments and infection growth rates may not hold in real-world contexts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of multiple regression to estimate the growth rate of infections","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Omitting day-of-week effects in china due to the timing of covid-19 outbreak","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incorporating single-day dummy variables for abrupt changes in covid-19 testing availability","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Policy variables not fully enacted","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Grouping of policies may obscure specific effects","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited sample of data for estimating policy impact","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Policy variables at a more granular level than infection data","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited quantity of data available","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-normal distribution of residuals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Idiosyncratic events within a country, such as holidays or backlog in testing laboratories, could generate nonuniform country-wide changes in infection growth for individual days.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Systematic underreporting of infections is a major concern in the ongoing pandemic, which can lead to inaccurate estimates of the true infection rate.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Systematic underreporting not affecting estimates for the effects of policy","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in testing regimes over space and time biasing infection growth rates","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Temporal underreporting generating sizable biases in estimated effects of anti-contagion policies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transient response of infection growth rates following policy deployment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Imposing assumptions regarding the temporal structure of policy effects","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited data availability and shorter periods of observation in other countries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assuming zero latent period for covid-19 infectiousness","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Minor potential impact of SEIR dynamics on coefficients recovered by empirical approach","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of simulated data to test statistical model accuracy","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Daily growth rates of infections without policy interventions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in cumulative infection estimates","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Seed each simulation by adjusting observed i t on the first day using country-specific estimates of case detection rates.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assuming an infection-fatality ratio of 0.75% without accounting for asymptomatic infections.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Estimating uncertainty by resampling from the estimated variance-covariance matrix of all regression parameters.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear impact of policy variables on infection growth rates immediately after deployment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible discrepancy between actual anti-contagion policies and their impact on infection or hospitalization growth rates","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited sample size and data for analysis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of cumulative cases reporting after 25 march 2020","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sensitivity of estimated averted/delayed infections to modeling assumptions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Assumption of recovery/death rates in countries without direct observation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to covid-19 in multiple countries during the mentioned time periods.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate estimation of r2 values for fixed-lag lengths","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mis-coding of post-policy days as no-policy days","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"}]}
